description.value:
Your agility and alertness has made it hard to hit you.  Should an attacker that you can see successfully hit you with an attack, you can use a reaction to add +2 to your AC.  If this causes the attack to miss, you take no damage and can immediately Disengage and move up to half your speed.  


    Additionally, when you are subjected to a Dexterity (Save) check made to take half damage from an effect, on a success you instead take no damage.  On a failure, you still only take half damage.
